Title: Repeals article 2 of the general business law relating to the sabbath
Summary: Relates to the Sabbath and activities performed on the Sabbath; makes conforming changes.
LawCode: Rpld Art 2, Gen Bus L; amd ยง208, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal article 2 of the general business law relating to the sabbath; and to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to removing references to such repealed law
